attributes.action: Force Telecoms companies to offer broadband only line rental (naked DSL)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Currently it is not possible to have broadband internet without also having a phone line and paying line rental for it (except on cable which is not always available). I urge the government to force offcom and/or telecoms companies to provide a different pricing structure that has cheaper line rental for broadband only customers.  For example, rather than £11 line rental; £5.50 for the phone and £5.50 for broadband line rental with the choice to take just one service.
